text.div:
This code system https://hl7.fi/fhir/finnish-base-profiles/CodeSystem/fi-base-condition-category defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
reason-for-visit Reason for visitIndicates that this Condition is reason for visit (or treatment period). Reason for visit may be a diagnosis asserted by a clinician (a Diagnosis or Diagnoosi in finnish) or other healthcare professional (Käyntisyy in finnish).

name: FiBaseConditionCategory
title: Finnish Condition categories
description: Additional categories for the Finnish Base Condition profile

concept.definition: Indicates that this Condition is reason for visit (or treatment period). Reason for visit may be a diagnosis asserted by a clinician (a Diagnosis or Diagnoosi in finnish) or other healthcare professional (Käyntisyy in finnish).
